description.overview: Heart represents your emotional core, emotional security, and sensitivity to feelings around you.
description.detailed: This group combines three emotional dimensions: Connections (romantic connection and openness), Resilience (emotional groundedness and stability), and Vulnerability (empathy and emotional awareness). Together they show your overall emotional state. High scores mean your heart is open, you feel emotionally stable, and your sensitivity is a gift. Low scores suggest emotional distance, fragility, or overwhelming emotional absorption.

quiet.challenging: Your heart needs protection right now - that's wisdom, not weakness. It'll open again when it's safe
quiet.mixed: Emotional energy is quiet today - subtle feelings are still feelings. Let them surface gently
quiet.harmonious: Your heart is peacefully calm - enjoy the stillness and let it restore you

mild.challenging: Heart is tentative today - don't force openness. Small moments of connection are enough
mild.mixed: Feelings are gentle and mixed - both are valid. You don't have to resolve them today
mild.harmonious: Your heart is softly open - connection flows naturally without effort

moderate.challenging: Emotional walls are up for a reason - work through them gently. You'll know when you're ready
moderate.mixed: Multiple emotional currents pulling you - sit with the complexity. Clarity comes from feeling, not thinking
moderate.harmonious: Heart energy is flowing - lean into connection. The people you reach out to will respond

high.challenging: Emotional intensity is strong - this is hard but you're not fragile. Feel it, then let it move through
high.mixed: Big feelings in all directions - you can hold complexity. Honor what's hard and what's beautiful
high.harmonious: Deep love and connection are available - let yourself receive it fully

extreme.challenging: Emotional overload is real - protect yourself or let it process, but know this wave will pass
extreme.mixed: Overwhelming feelings, beautiful and difficult at once - you're built to feel deeply. That's your gift
extreme.harmonious: Heart completely open - this is rare. Use it for the conversations and connections that matter most
